mapper.select:
SELECT b.system_role_name AS systemRoleName, a.system_user_id AS systemUserId, a.system_user_account AS systemUserAccount, a.system_user_type AS systemUserType, a.system_user_password AS systemUserPassword, a.system_user_nickname AS systemUserNickname, a.system_user_telephone AS systemUserTelephone, a.system_user_email AS systemUserEmail, a.system_role_id AS systemRoleId, a.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, a.first_create_by AS firstCreateBy, a.first_create_date AS firstCreateDate, a.data_status AS dataStatus, a.data_divide_id AS dataDivideId, a.description AS description, a.last_update_by AS lastUpdateBy, a.last_update_date AS lastUpdateDate FROM system_user_info a JOIN system_role_info b ON a.system_role_id = b.system_role_id
a.system_user_id > 100 AND a.data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.system_user_account like CONCAT('%', #{systemUserAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') AND a.system_user_nickname like CONCAT('%', #{systemUserNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
